title: I would like to develop a book keeping app please.
snippet:
I would like to build a book keeping app to work initially on mac and iOS. The app should primarily focus on cash management to begin with. An application I like is GNU cash. A basic general ledger with multi currency (all countries) is desired. Envision a cash book keeping app to be deployed in developing countries where handling of cash is still very relevant and necessary. First would be to have a high adoption rate of using this application to replace cash collection books used in developing countries' trading markets. 
My vision, basically, is to eventually develop an UBER for physical cash currency conversion. May the journey begin.
